source_title: Status yellow rain and wind warnings issued for Cork – Public advised to plan ahead

extras.river_discharge: high tides may prevent river water from discharging to the sea

evidence: The status yellow rain warning for Cork is set to come into effect from 9pm on Monday, December 8 to 9am on Tuesday, December 9.
after a week of persistent rain, many rivers are approaching bank full conditions.
Furthermore, soils are waterlogged thereby increasing the likelihood of rainfall runoff.

high tides may prevent river water from discharging to the sea, potentially causing water to back up within river channels and significantly increasing the risk of upstream flooding along low-lying areas.
Coastal flooding is likely, particularly during high tide times and in exposed low-lying areas.

source_title: China’s exports grow 5.9% in November despite major drop in US shipments
evidence: shipments to the United States dropped nearly 29% from a year earlier
A year-long trade truce between China and the US was reached at a meeting between US President Donald Trump and Chinese leader Xi Jinping in late October in South Korea.
The US has lowered its tariffs on China, and China has promised to halt its export controls related to rare earths.
